item.description:
FULLDAY BeachVolley meetup! We will repeat experience in the beach in front of Columbus Park! there are 2 extra nets already there and I'll bring mine so a plenty of people can come! So I'm not going to put any attendance limit; also because the idea is to start early in the morning, and be the full day, but taking it easy, not playing all the time, having a picnic session, whatever! so bring food, music, drinks...!

Access by T: pick the Red Line until JFK U.Mass.
By car: beware, it seems parking is a pain.

SO LET'S HAVE SOME FUN!!
item.name: Full day Beach-volley: 3 nets at the beach in front of Columbus Park
